ComicInfo.Summary:
The first re-mastered debut from Aspen's Big Dog Ink imprint concludes!
Shahrazad finds herself in a life-or-death battle for the ages, as she must not only prove that she can survive-but, also, that she can kill!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Market Edition A | Mike Krome & Nei Ruffino | 1 | B | Direct Market Edition B | Elizabeth Torque | 3 | C | 1:8 Limited Edition Retailer Incentive Cover | J. Scott Campbell & Peter Steigerwald | 4 | D | AspenStore.com Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 750 | Jen Broomall & Ceci de la Cruz | Missing | E | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 200 | Nei Ruffino | 2 |
